ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ya actually. You missed a spot. :) Not that I disagree with your other statements. I was also in beta and, I felt, was pretty religious about submitting
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Jun 21/00, "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...> wrote:
>
> I leave you with this thought:
> If there weren't level 50 players to test the planes, dragons, kunark,
> etc... how stable would those zones be on the live servers? Hope you enjoy
> falling through the world for 32,000 dmg when walking across the plane of
> hate. I've had it happen. Have you?
>

Ya actually. You missed a spot. :)

Not that I disagree with your other statements. I was also in beta and,
I felt, was pretty religious about submitting bug reports and actually
testing things, but when final came and they expected you to pay to test
for them I took a pass on it. It's bad enough paying to test their
release code. I think the best thing that could happen right now is for
everyone to stop playing on the test server. Verant doesn't deserve you.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
